p: The plantsâ€™ secondary metabolites (SMs) are considered as chemo-strategies for defense reactions to environmental stresses as drought and salinity [ 38, 39]. As a protection against these conditions, oxidative stress was induced as antioxidants. The antioxidants can be classified into two classes, enzyme antioxidants, and non-enzymatic constituents part of the non-enzymatic constituents, the secondary plant metabolites comprising the flavonoids and non-flavonoid polyphenols [ 40, 41].
